author: TheJurie

review: Been using this for only 5-6 days now and so far, both myself and my 7 year old are thrilled with it. When he realized that he started watching a show on TV through the Amazon Fire TV and then it picked up where he left  off on the iPad Amazon Video app, he said, and I quote: "Mom!!! That is TOTALLY awesome. I soooooo love our Amazon Fire TV".As for the grown up here, I too love it. Haven't yet had a chance to view lots of the free Prime stuff (I am a Prime member and strongly recommend becoming one if you aren't already) content but the fact that I can now stream my Netflix content and have access to all the Prime stuff as well is great. And the voice recognition feature works GREAT!Giving it 5 stars for now. Hopefully that doesn't change with further use :)
